name: BCBG MAX AZRIA GROUP
overview: BCBGMAXAZRIAGROUP, INC. owns and operates apparel retail stores for women in the United States, Canada, and internationally. It offers evening dresses, denim, outerwear, footwear, swimwear, handbags and leather goods, swim wear, and footwear, watches, as well as accessories, such as jewelry belts, sunglasses, scarves and wraps, and hats. In addition, it sells its products online. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Vernon, California.
